      • createXMLFiles

        public void createXMLFiles()
                    throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                           java.io.IOException,
                           DotDataException
        This method will pull a list of all tables /classed being managed by hibernate and export them, one class per file to the backupTempFilePath as valid XML. It uses XStream to write the xml out to the files.
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException
        java.io.IOException
        DotDataException
        DotCacheException
